thread.title: Guy bombs ‘Wheel of Fortune’ with one letter left and Twitter roasts him (10 Photos)
thread.title_full: Guy bombs ‘Wheel of Fortune’ with one letter left and Twitter roasts him (10 Photos)

author: Kayla
title: Guy bombs ‘Wheel of Fortune’ with one letter left and Twitter roasts him (10 Photos)
text:
View as Slideshow 1 
I can only assume this guy Kevin had a complete blackout moment and lost all stream of consciousness when answering “A STREETCAR NA_ED DESIRE…” because who in their right mind would pick “k.” 
Maybe it was a porno he saw awhile back. Maybe he has a some sort of crazy desire to get naked in a streetcar. Either way this guy blew it hard during this question and again two questions letter when he answered “sticky picket” instead of “sticky ticket.” 
The pure awkwardness in Pat’s voice is so thick it’s almost tangible and the numerous gasps in the audience just make the whole mess even better. Within minutes people were tweeting about the mishap, labeling this the worst “Wheel of Fortune” blunder probably ever. 2 — actually, a dad (@weedsocialist) March 21, 2017 3 — Emily Weiss (@emily_weiss28) March 21, 2017 4
